fullplot: This film is about psychology of people, about lonesome persons, about terrible mentality and about fantastic dreams...
plot: This film is about psychology of people, about lonesome persons, about terrible mentality and about fantastic dreams...
title: The Wishing Tree

tomatoes.consensus: Rich, stylized visuals work with effective performances in Ridley Scott's take on Joseph Conrad's Napoleonic story, resulting in an impressive feature film debut for the director.
